start: ^Well hello there, hope you're ready for your first night of work.
second: ^There are a couple of things to consider, it's really simple.
third: ^First off, tonight is classic movie night. We will be showing only the movies on display.
fourth: ^Remember, the customer is always right, do everything they say. Also, popcorn is 10% off on Fridays, which is tonight.
main: ^Last thing, the manager wants you to close alone tonight. You think you can do that?
^No way, I just started working here!

c-0: ^Cool, your shift ends at midnight. Go ahead and clock in on the computer.
c-1: ^The theater is small enough for you to take care off. Besides, we rarely get a large crowd here.
c-2: ^Well too bad, you don't have a choice.. Now go clock in on the computer.

oneB: ^Okay, where do I clock in again?

c-0: ^Use the computer behind me, it's the only one you can clock in to.
